channel.title: Using MySQL in Java - Paying for assistance!
channel.description:
How would you like to earn 600K?
I need some help using MySQL Connections in JAVA Files, as i want my server to connect to a MySQL Database on a different host to insert and read from the MySQL Table on my Shared Hosting account.
If you can help feel free to add stanyer7@hotmail.co.uk to MSN :)

item.title: Using MySQL in Java - Paying for assistance!
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:4, topic:128109”][quote author=Inmate™ link=topic=178750.msg1635484#msg1635484 date=1185732914]
Idk…Write a socket?
[/quote]
lololololololololololooloooool

Sorry but i couldn’t stop laughing at that lololl

@Stanyer, buying/selling anything apart from scar scripts on this forums is against the rules.
Lescape pk got banned for having it in his sig, with no warning.

But you should look more into jdbc thats what iv been using for my Rsc server (stores a whole lot in sql)[/quote]

I’m not buying/selling anything i’m rewarding someone for helping me.

And i know near enough all PHP/Mysql just not Java/Mysql

Read full topic
